Package com.socialize.cache

Interface Summary
ICacheable<K extends Comparable<K>> Represents an object that can be cached.
ICacheableFactory<K extends Comparable<K>,E extends ICacheable<K>> Used by the cache when an object is not found.
ICacheEventListener<K extends Comparable<K>,E extends ICacheable<K>> Listens for cache events.
ISuicidal<K extends Comparable<K>> A suicidal object will destroy itself once a given condition is met.
 

Class Summary
Key<K extends Comparable<K>>  
TTLCache<K extends Comparable<K>,E extends ICacheable<K>> Simple cache object backed by a synchronized map which allows a TTL (Time To Live) for objects in cache.
TTLObject<K extends Comparable<K>,E extends ICacheable<K>>
